are indistinguishable from ASCII characters and thus may make excellent candidates for homoglyph attack characters.
author: Micah Babinski, @micahbabinski
falsepositives: File names with legitimate Cyrillic text. Will likely require tuning (or not be usable) in countries where these alphabets are in use.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: PowerShell Script Dropped Via PowerShell.EXE
description: Detects PowerShell creating a PowerShell file (.ps1). While often times this behavior is benign, sometimes it can be a sign of a dropper script trying to achieve persistence.
author: frack113
falsepositives: False positives will differ depending on the environment and scripts used. Apply additional filters accordingly.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.ps1' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\_\_PSScriptPolicyTest\_%' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Legitimate Application Dropped Archive
description: Detects programs on a Windows system that should not write an archive to disk
author: frack113, Florian Roth
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powerpnt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\msaccess.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\mspub.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\eqnedt32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\visio.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wordpad.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wordview.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\certutil.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\certoc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\CertReq.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\Desktopimgdownldr.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\esentutl.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\finger.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\notepad.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\AcroRd32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\RdrCEF.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\hh.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.zip' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.7z' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.diagcab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.appx' ESCAPE '\'))

title: ISO File Created Within Temp Folders
description: Detects the creation of a ISO file in the Outlook temp folder or in the Appdata temp folder. Typical of Qakbot TTP from end-July 2022.
author: @sam0x90
falsepositives: Potential FP by sysadmin opening a zip file containing a legitimate ISO file
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.zip\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.iso' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Windows\\INetCache\\Content.Outlook\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.iso' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Uncommon File Created In Office Startup Folder
description: Detects the creation of a file with an uncommon extension in an Office application startup folder
author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: False positive might stem from rare extensions used by other Office utilities.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Word\\STARTUP%' ESCAPE '\' OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Office%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Program Files%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\STARTUP%' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE '%.docb' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.docm' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.docx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.dotm' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.mdb' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.mdw' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.pdf' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.wll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.wwl' ESCAPE '\'))) OR ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Excel\\XLSTART%' ESCAPE '\' OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Office%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Program Files%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\XLSTART%' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE '%.xll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xls' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xlsm' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xlsx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xlt' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xltm' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xlw' ESCAPE '\')))) AND NOT ((NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\Common Files\\Microsoft Shared\\ClickToRun\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND NewProcessName LIKE '%\\OfficeClickToRun.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR ((NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\winword.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\excel.exe' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Creation Of Non-Existent System DLL
description:
Detects the creation of system DLLs that are usually not present on the system (or at least not in system directories).
Usually this technique is used to achieve DLL hijacking.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), fornotes
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\TSMSISrv.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\TSVIPSrv.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\wbemcomn.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\WLBSCTRL.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\wow64log.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\WptsExtensions.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\SprintCSP.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: Wmiprvse Wbemcomn DLL Hijack - File
description: Detects a threat actor creating a file named `wbemcomn.dll` in the `C:\Windows\System32\wbem\` directory over the network and loading it for a WMI DLL Hijack scenario.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName = 'System' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\wbem\\wbemcomn.dll' ESCAPE '\')

title: AWL Bypass with Winrm.vbs and Malicious WsmPty.xsl/WsmTxt.xsl - File
description: Detects execution of attacker-controlled WsmPty.xsl or WsmTxt.xsl via winrm.vbs and copied cscript.exe (can be renamed)
author: Julia Fomina, oscd.community
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%WsmPty.xsl' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%WsmTxt.xsl' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious File Drop by Exchange
description: Detects suspicious file type dropped by an Exchange component in IIS
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\w3wp.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%MSExchange%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.asp' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.ashx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbs' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Startup Folder File Write
description: A General detection for files being created in the Windows startup directory. This could be an indicator of persistence.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
falsepositives: FP could be caused by legitimate application writing shortcuts for example. This folder should always be inspected to make sure that all the files in there are legitimate
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\StartUp%' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\wuauclt.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\$WINDOWS.~BT\\NewOS\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: PowerShell Module File Created By Non-PowerShell Process
description: Detects the creation of a new PowerShell module ".psm1", ".psd1", ".dll", ".ps1", etc. by a non-PowerShell process
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\WindowsPowerShell\\Modules\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\PowerShell\\7\\Modules\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7-preview\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\poqexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\poqexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: PowerShell Profile Modification
description: Detects the creation or modification of a powershell profile which could indicate suspicious activity as the profile can be used as a mean of persistence
author: HieuTT35, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: System administrator creating Powershell profile manually
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft.PowerShell\_profile.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\PowerShell\\profile.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7-preview\\profile.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\profile.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\profile.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\WindowsPowerShell\\profile.ps1' ESCAPE '\')

title: LSASS Process Memory Dump Creation Via Taskmgr.EXE
description: Detects the creation of an "lsass.dmp" file by the taskmgr process. This indicates a manual dumping of the LSASS.exe process memory using Windows Task Manager.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel
falsepositives: Rare case of troubleshooting by an administrator or support that has to be investigated regardless
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\system32\\taskmgr.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\taskmgr.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsass%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.DMP%' ESCAPE '\')

title: WScript or CScript Dropper - File
description: Detects a file ending in jse, vbe, js, vba, vbs written by cscript.exe or wscript.exe
author: Tim Shelton
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.jse' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.js' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vba' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbs' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UAC Bypass Using Windows Media Player - File
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using Windows Media Player osksupport.dll (UACMe 32)
author: Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\OskSupport.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\system32\\DllHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Program Files\\Windows Media Player\\osk.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: PsExec Service File Creation
description: Detects default PsExec service filename which indicates PsExec service installation and execution
author: Thomas Patzke
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\\PSEXESVC.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Suspicious PFX File Creation
description: A general detection for processes creating PFX files. This could be an indicator of an adversary exporting a local certificate to a PFX file.
author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%.pfx' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Templates\\Windows\\Windows\_TemporaryKey.pfx%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\CMake\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: HackTool - Dumpert Process Dumper Default File
description: Detects the creation of the default dump file used by Outflank Dumpert tool. A process dumper, which dumps the lsass process memory
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%dumpert.dmp' ESCAPE '\'

title: QuarksPwDump Dump File
description: Detects a dump file written by QuarksPwDump password dumper
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\SAM-%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.dmp%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Persistence Via Microsoft Office Add-In
description: Detects potential persistence activity via startup add-ins that load when Microsoft Office starts (.wll/.xll are simply .dll fit for Word or Excel).
author: NVISO
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Word\\Startup\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.wll' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Excel\\Startup\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.xll' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%Microsoft\\Excel\\XLSTART\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.xlam' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Addins\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.xlam' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.xla' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.ppam' ESCAPE '\')))

title: LiveKD Driver Creation
description: Detects the creation of the LiveKD driver, which is used for live kernel debugging
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate usage of LiveKD for debugging purposes will also trigger this
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\drivers\\LiveKdD.SYS' ESCAPE '\' AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\livekd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\livek64.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: WinSxS Executable File Creation By Non-System Process
description: Detects the creation of binaries in the WinSxS folder by non-system processes
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\Systems32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: LSASS Process Memory Dump Files
description: Detects creation of files with names used by different memory dumping tools to create a memory dump of the LSASS process memory, which contains user credentials.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsass.dmp' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsass.zip' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsass.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Andrew.dmp' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Coredump.dmp' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\NotLSASS.zip' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\PPLBlade.dmp' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsass\_2%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsassdump%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsassdmp%' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\lsass%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.dmp%' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%SQLDmpr%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.mdmp' ESCAPE '\') OR (TargetFilename LIKE 'nanodump%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.dmp' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious MSExchangeMailboxReplication ASPX Write
description: Detects suspicious activity in which the MSExchangeMailboxReplication process writes .asp and .apsx files to disk, which could be a sign of ProxyShell exploitation
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\MSExchangeMailboxReplication.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.asp' ESCAPE '\'))

title: LiveKD Driver Creation By Uncommon Process
description: Detects the creation of the LiveKD driver by a process image other than "livekd.exe".
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Administrators might rename LiveKD before its usage which could trigger this. Add additional names you use to the filter
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Windows\\System32\\drivers\\LiveKdD.SYS' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\livekd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\livek64.exe' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Process Monitor Driver Creation By Non-Sysinternals Binary
description: Detects creation of the Process Monitor driver by processes other than Process Monitor (procmon) itself.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some false positives may occur with legitimate renamed process monitor binaries
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\procmon%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.sys' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\procmon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\procmon64.exe' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: ScreenConnect Temporary Installation Artefact
description:
An adversary may use legitimate desktop support and remote access software, such as Team Viewer, Go2Assist, LogMein, AmmyyAdmin, etc, to establish an interactive command and control channel to target systems within networks.
These services are commonly used as legitimate technical support software, and may be allowed by application control within a target environment.
Remote access tools like VNC, Ammyy, and Teamviewer are used frequently when compared with other legitimate software commonly used by adversaries. (Citation: Symantec Living off the Land)
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Bin\\ScreenConnect.%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Advanced IP Scanner - File Event
description: Detects the use of Advanced IP Scanner. Seems to be a popular tool for ransomware groups.
author: @ROxPinTeddy
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\Advanced IP Scanner 2%' ESCAPE '\'

title: Malicious DLL File Dropped in the Teams or OneDrive Folder
description:
Detects creation of a malicious DLL file in the location where the OneDrive or Team applications
Upon execution of the Teams or OneDrive application, the dropped malicious DLL file (iphlpapi.dll) is sideloaded
author: frack113
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%iphlpapi.dll%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Exploitation Attempt Of Undocumented WindowsServer RCE
description: Detects potential exploitation attempt of undocumented Windows Server Pre Auth Remote Code Execution (RCE)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND NewProcessName LIKE '%\\svchost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE '%-k DHCPServer%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-k DHCPServer%' ESCAPE '\' AND (User LIKE '%NETWORK SERVICE%' ESCAPE '\' OR User LIKE '%NETZWERKDIENST%' ESCAPE '\' OR User LIKE '%SERVIZIO DI RETE%' ESCAPE '\' OR User LIKE '%SERVICIO DE RED%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-2283 Exploitation
description: Detects potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-2283 an authentication bypass in libSSH. The exploitation method causes an error message stating that keys for curve25519 could not be generated. It is an error message that is a sign of an exploitation attempt. It is not a sign of a successful exploitation.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Errors with the initialization or generation of the X25519 elliptic curve keys may generate the same error message
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE logs MATCH ('"Failed to generate curve25519 keys"')

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Vulnerable Endpoint Connection (Webserver)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-local.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-progress.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/json/setup-restore.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/server-info.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/setup/setupadministrator.action%' ESCAPE '\') AND sc-status IN ('200', '302', '405'))

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Vulnerable Endpoint Connection (Proxy)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND (cs-uri LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-local.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri LIKE '%/json/setup-restore-progress.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri LIKE '%/json/setup-restore.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri LIKE '%/server-info.action%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri LIKE '%/setup/setupadministrator.action%' ESCAPE '\') AND sc-status IN ('200', '302', '405'))

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Suspicious Confluence Child Process (Windows)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ((ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\tomcat8.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\tomcat9.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\tomcat10.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ParentCommandLine LIKE '%confluence%' ESCAPE '\') AND ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR OriginalFileName IN ('Cmd.Exe', 'PowerShell.EXE')))

title: CVE-2023-22518 Exploitation Attempt - Suspicious Confluence Child Process (Linux)
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-22518 (Confluence Data Center / Confluence Server), where an attacker can exploit vulnerable endpoints to e.g. create admin accounts and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((ParentProcessName LIKE '%/java' ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE '%confluence%' ESCAPE '\' AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%/bash' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%/curl' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%/echo' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((CommandLine LIKE '%ulimit -u%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: MSMQ Corrupted Packet Encountered
description: Detects corrupted packets sent to the MSMQ service. Could potentially be a sign of CVE-2023-21554 exploitation
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Application' AND Provider_Name = 'MSMQ' AND EventID = '2027' AND Level = '2')

title: CVE-2023-46747 Exploitation Activity - Proxy
description: Detects exploitation activity of CVE-2023-46747 an unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability in F5 BIG-IP.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method = 'POST' AND c-uri LIKE '%/mgmt/tm/util/bash%' ESCAPE '\') AND (( = '2f746d75692f436f6e74726f6c2f666f726d' AND  = '666f726d5f706167653d253266746d756925326673797374656d253266757365722532666372656174652e6a7370') OR ( = '/tmui/Control/form' AND  LIKE 'form\_page=\%2ftmui\%2fsystem\%2fuser\%2fcreate.jsp' ESCAPE '\')))

title: CVE-2023-46747 Exploitation Activity - Webserver
description: Detects exploitation activity of CVE-2023-46747 an unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability in F5 BIG-IP.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/mgmt/tm/util/bash%' ESCAPE '\') AND (( = '2f746d75692f436f6e74726f6c2f666f726d' AND  = '666f726d5f706167653d253266746d756925326673797374656d253266757365722532666372656174652e6a7370') OR ( = '/tmui/Control/form' AND  LIKE 'form\_page=\%2ftmui\%2fsystem\%2fuser\%2fcreate.jsp' ESCAPE '\')))

title: CVE-2023-40477 Potential Exploitation - .REV File Creation
description: Detects the creation of ".rev" files by WinRAR. Could be indicative of potential exploitation of CVE-2023-40477. Look for a suspicious execution shortly after creation or a WinRAR application crash.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate extraction of multipart or recovery volumes ZIP files
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\explorer.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\WinRAR.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.rev' ESCAPE '\')

title: CVE-2023-40477 Potential Exploitation - WinRAR Application Crash
description: Detects a crash of "WinRAR.exe" where the version is lower than 6.23. This could indicate potential exploitation of CVE-2023-40477
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate crash for reasons other than exploitation of the vulnerability
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Application' AND (Provider_Name = 'Application Error' AND EventID = '1000' AND AppName = 'WinRAR.exe') AND NOT (((AppVersion LIKE '6.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '6.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '6.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '6.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR AppVersion LIKE '7.%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: MOVEit CVE-2023-34362 Exploitation Attempt - Potential Web Shell Request
description: Detects get requests to specific files used during the exploitation of MOVEit CVE-2023-34362
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND (cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/human2.aspx%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/\_human2.aspx%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential MOVEit Transfer CVE-2023-34362 Exploitation
description: Detects file indicators of potential exploitation of MOVEit CVE-2023-34362.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: To avoid FP, this rule should only be applied on MOVEit servers.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\%' ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetFilename LIKE '%.7z' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.bat' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.vbs' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%.zip' ESCAPE '\')) OR (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEit Transfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\\_human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx.lnk' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\MOVEitTransfer\\wwwroot\\human2.aspx' ESCAPE '\') OR ((CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-03- %' ESCAPE '\' OR CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-04- %' ESCAPE '\' OR CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-05- %' ESCAPE '\' OR CreationUtcTime LIKE '2023-06- %' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Windows\\Microsoft.net\\Framework64\\v%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Temporary ASP.NET Files\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%App\_Web\_%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\'))

title: CVE-2023-4966 Potential Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Webserver
description: Detects potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via webserver logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Michael Haag (STRT)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '200')

title: CVE-2023-4966 Potential Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Proxy
description: Detects potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via proxy logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Michael Haag (STRT)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '200')

title: CVE-2023-4966 Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Proxy
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via proxy logs by looking for a very long host header string.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-host REGEXP '.{150}')

title: CVE-2023-4966 Exploitation Attempt - Citrix ADC Sensitive Information Disclosure - Webserver
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-4966 a Citrix ADC and NetScaler Gateway sensitive information disclosure vulnerability via webserver logs by looking for a very long host header string.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/oauth/idp/.well-known/openid-configuration%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-host REGEXP '.{150}')

title: CVE-2023-38331 Exploitation Attempt - Suspicious Double Extension File
description: Detects the creation of a file with a double extension and a space by WinRAR. This could be a sign of exploitation of CVE-2023-38331
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\WinRAR.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\Rar$%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename REGEXP '\.[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,4} \.')

title: CVE-2023-38331 Exploitation Attempt - Suspicious WinRAR Child Process
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-38331 (WinRAR before v6.23), where an attacker can leverage WinRAR to execute arbitrary commands and binaries.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\WinRAR.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\Rar$%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP '\.[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,4} \.' AND ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\') OR OriginalFileName IN ('Cmd.Exe', 'cscript.exe', 'PowerShell.EXE', 'pwsh.dll', 'wscript.exe')))

title: Potential CVE-2023-27363 Exploitation - HTA File Creation By FoxitPDFReader
description: Detects suspicious ".hta" file creation in the startup folder by Foxit Reader. This can be an indication of CVE-2023-27363 exploitation.
author: Gregory
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\FoxitPDFReader.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%.hta' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2023-36874 Exploitation - Fake Wermgr.Exe Creation
description: Detects the creation of a file named "wermgr.exe" being created in an uncommon directory. This could be a sign of potential exploitation of CVE-2023-36874.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%\\wermgr.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\$WINDOWS.~BT\\NewOS\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\$WinREAgent\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\servicing\\LCU\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\System32\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\WUDownloadCache\\%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Potential CVE-2023-36874 Exploitation - Uncommon Report.Wer Location
description: Detects the creation of a "Report.wer" file in an uncommon folder structure. This could be a sign of potential exploitation of CVE-2023-36874.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\\WER\\ReportArchive\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Report.wer' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\AppCrash\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\AppHang\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\Critical\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\Kernel\_%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%\\ReportArchive\\NonCritical\_%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Potential CVE-2023-36874 Exploitation - Fake Wermgr Execution
description: Detects the execution of a renamed "cmd", "powershell" or "powershell_ise" binary. Attackers were seen using these binaries in a renamed form as "wermgr.exe" in exploitation of CVE-2023-36874
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND (OriginalFileName LIKE 'Cmd.Exe' ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE 'powershell\_ise.EXE' ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE 'powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wermgr.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2023-25717 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-25717 a Remote Code Execution via an unauthenticated HTTP GET Request, in Ruckus Wireless Admin
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Some rare false positives may occur if the password contains the characters "$(". Apply addition indicators such as executed commands to remove FP
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/forms/doLogin%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%login\_username%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%password%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%$(%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%\%24\%28%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Exploitation Attempt Of CVE-2023-46214 Using Public POC Code
description: Detects exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-46214, a remote code execution (RCE) in Splunk Enterprise through insecure XML parsing using known public proof of concept code
author: Lars B. P. Frydenskov(Trifork Security)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method = 'POST' AND sc-status IN ('200', '302')) AND ((cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/splunkd/\_\_upload/indexing/preview%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%NO\_BINARY\_CHECK=1%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%input.path=shell.xsl%' ESCAPE '\') OR (cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/api/search/jobs%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/results%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/opt/splunk/var/run/splunk/dispatch/%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/shell.xsl%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential CVE-2023-46214 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects potential exploitation of CVE-2023-46214, a remote code execution (RCE) in Splunk Enterprise through insecure XML parsing
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Bhavin Patel (STRT)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'POST' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%NO\_BINARY\_CHECK=1%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%input.path%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%.xsl' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status IN ('200', '302'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-25157 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects a potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-25157 a SQL injection in GeoServer
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/geoserver/ows%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%CQL\_FILTER=%' ESCAPE '\' AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%PropertyIsLike%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%strEndsWith%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%strStartsWith%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%FeatureId%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%jsonArrayContains%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%DWithin%' ESCAPE '\') AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%+--%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%+AS+%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%+OR+%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%FROM%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%ORDER+BY%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%SELECT%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%sleep\%28%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%substring\%28%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%UNION%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%WHERE%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-27997 Exploitation Indicators
description:
Detects indicators of potential exploitation of CVE-2023-27997 in Frotigate weblogs.
To avoid false positives it is best to look for successive requests to the endpoints mentioned as well as weird values of the "enc" parameter
author: Sergio Palacios Dominguez, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((cs-method IN ('GET', 'POST') AND (cs-uri-query LIKE '%/remote/hostcheck\_validate%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-uri-query LIKE '%/remote/logincheck%' ESCAPE '\')) AND logs MATCH ('"enc="'))

title: CVE-2023-23397 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects outlook initiating connection to a WebDAV or SMB share, which could be a sign of CVE-2023-23397 exploitation.
author: Robert Lee @quantum_cookie
falsepositives: Searchprotocolhost.exe likes to query these registry keys. To avoid false postives, it's better to filter out those events before they reach the SIEM
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND EventID IN ('4656', '4663') AND ProcessName LIKE '%\\OUTLOOK.EXE' ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectName LIKE '%\\REGISTRY\\MACHINE\\SYSTEM%' ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectName LIKE '%Services\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (ObjectName LIKE '%WebClient\\NetworkProvider' ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE '%LanmanWorkstation\\NetworkProvider' ESCAPE '\') AND AccessList LIKE '%\%\%4416%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Outlook Task/Note Reminder Received
description: Detects changes to the registry values related to outlook that indicates that a reminder was triggered for a Note or Task item. This could be a sign of exploitation of CVE-2023-23397. Further investigation is required to determine the success of an exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
falsepositives: Legitimate reminders received for a task or a note will also trigger this rule.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4657' AND (OperationType LIKE 'Existing registry value modified' ESCAPE '\') AND Channel = 'Security' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Office\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\Outlook\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE '%\\Tasks\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE '%\\Notes\\%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-23752 Exploitation Attempt
description: Detects the potential exploitation attempt of CVE-2023-23752 an Improper access check, in web service endpoints in Joomla
author: Bhabesh Raj
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%/api/index.php/v1/%' ESCAPE '\' AND cs-uri-query LIKE '%public=true%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Information Disclosure CVE-2023-43261 Exploitation - Proxy
description: Detects exploitation attempts of CVE-2023-43261 and information disclosure in Milesight UR5X, UR32L, UR32, UR35, UR41 before v35.3.0.7 that allows attackers to access sensitive router components in proxy logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Thurein Oo
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND c-uri LIKE '%/lang/log/httpd.log%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '200')

title: Potential Information Disclosure CVE-2023-43261 Exploitation - Web
description: Detects exploitation attempts of CVE-2023-43261 and information disclosure in Milesight UR5X, UR32L, UR32, UR35, UR41 before v35.3.0.7 that allows attackers to access sensitive router components in access logs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Thurein Oo
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/lang/log/httpd.log%' ESCAPE '\' AND sc-status = '200')

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation - File Downloads
description: Detects files seen being requested by RomCom while potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND (c-uri LIKE '%/ex001.url%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/file001.search-ms%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/file001.url%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/file001.vbs%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/file1.mht%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/o2010.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/redir\_obj.html%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/RFile.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/zip\_k.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/zip\_k2.asp%' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/zip\_k3.asp%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation Pattern
description: Detects a unique pattern seen being used by RomCom potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND c-uri LIKE '%/MSHTML\_C7/%' ESCAPE '\' AND c-uri REGEXP '\?d=[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}')

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation - Share Access
description: Detects access to a file share with a naming schema seen being used during exploitation of CVE-2023-36884
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND EventID = '5140' AND ((ShareName LIKE '%\\MSHTML\_C7\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ShareName REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}') OR (ShareLocalPath LIKE '%\\MSHTML\_C7\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND ShareLocalPath REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}')))

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation - URL Marker
description: Detects a unique URL marker seen being used by RomCom potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND c-uri LIKE '%/MSHTML\_C7/%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2023-36884 Exploitation Dropped File
description: Detects a specific file being created in the recent folder of Office. These files have been seen being dropped during potential exploitations of CVE-2023-36884
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE 'C:\\Users\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Office\\Recent\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\file001.url' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential CVE-2303-36884 URL Request Pattern Traffic
description: Detects a specific URL pattern containing a specific extension and parameters pointing to an IP address. This pattern was seen being used by RomCOM potentially exploiting CVE-2023-36884
author: X__Junior
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND c-uri REGEXP '\.(zip|asp|htm|url|xml|chm|mht|vbs|search-ms)\?d=[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}')

title: Lace Tempest PowerShell Evidence Eraser
description: Detects a PowerShell script used by Lace Tempest APT to erase evidence from victim servers by exploiting CVE-2023-47246 as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%cleanLL%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%usersfiles.war%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Remove-Item -Path "$tomcat\_dir%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%SysAidServer%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%sleep %' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%while(1)%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest Cobalt Strike Download
description: Detects specific command line execution used by Lace Tempest to download Cobalt Strike as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-nop -w hidden -c IEX ((new-object net.webclient).downloadstring(%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/a'')%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest File Indicators
description: Detects PowerShell script file creation with specific names or suffixes which was seen being used often in PowerShell scripts by FIN7
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles\\user.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles.war' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\leave' ESCAPE '\') OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\user.%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest PowerShell Launcher
description: Detects a PowerShell script used by Lace Tempest APT to launch their malware loader by exploiting CVE-2023-47246 as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Starting user.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%\\usersfiles\\user.exe%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%Remove-Item -Force "$wapps%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%(Sophos).%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lace Tempest Malware Loader Execution
description: Detects execution of a specific binary based on filename and hash used by Lace Tempest to load additional malware as reported by SysAid Team
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\SysAidServer\\tomcat\\webapps\\usersfiles\\user.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR Hashes LIKE '%SHA256=B5ACF14CDAC40BE590318DEE95425D0746E85B1B7B1CBD14DA66F21F2522BF4D%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential APT Mustang Panda Activity Against Australian Gov
description: Detects specific command line execution used by Mustang Panda in a targeted attack against the Australian government as reported by Lab52
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%copy SolidPDFCreator.dll%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\\PhotoTvRHD\\SolidPDFCreator.dll%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%SolidPDF%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Users\\Public\\Libraries\\PhotoTvRHD\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Onyx Sleet APT File Creation Indicators
description: Detects file creation activity that is related to Onyx Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\Windows\\ADFS\\bg\\inetmgr.exe' ESCAPE '\'

title: Okta 2023 Breach Indicator Of Compromise
description:
Detects new user account creation or activation with specific names related to the Okta Support System 2023 breach.
This rule can be enhanced by filtering out known and legitimate username used in your environnement.
author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (eventtype IN ('user.lifecycle.create', 'user.lifecycle.activate') AND target.user.display.name LIKE '%svc\_network\_backup%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Peach Sandstorm APT C2 Communication Activity
description: Detects potential C2 communication activity related to Peach Sandstorm APT
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-method = 'GET' AND (c-uri LIKE '%/api/Core/Command/Init' ESCAPE '\' OR c-uri LIKE '%/api/Core/Command/Restart' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Peach Sandstorm APT Process Activity Indicators
description: Detects process creation activity related to Peach Sandstorm APT
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND CommandLine LIKE '%QP''s\*(58vaP!tF4%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Lazarus APT DLL Sideloading Activity
description: Detects sideloading of trojanized DLLs used in Lazarus APT campaign in the case of a Spanish aerospace company
author: Thurein Oo, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\ProgramShared\\PresentationHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE ':\\ProgramShared\\mscoree.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\colorcpl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\colorui.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Oracle\\Java\\fixmapi.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Oracle\\Java\\mapistub.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\ARM\\tabcal.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE 'C:\\ProgramData\\Adobe\\ARM\\HID.dll' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Mint Sandstorm - AsperaFaspex Suspicious Process Execution
description: Detects suspicious execution from AsperaFaspex as seen used by Mint Sandstorm
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), MSTIC (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND (ParentProcessName LIKE '%aspera%' ESCAPE '\' AND ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\ruby%' ESCAPE '\') AND (((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% echo %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-dumpmode%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%-ssh%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dmp%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%add-MpPreference%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%adscredentials%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%bitsadmin%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%certutil%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%csvhost.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%DownloadFile%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%DownloadString%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%dsquery%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%ekern.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%FromBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iex %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%iex(%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-Expression%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-WebRequest%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%localgroup administrators%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%net group%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%net user%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%o365accountconfiguration%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%query session%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%samaccountname=%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%set-MpPreference%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%svhost.exe%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%System.IO.Compression%' ESCAPE CommandLine REGEXP '[-/][Ee^]{1,2}[ncodema^]*\s[A-Za-z0-9+/=]{15,}')) OR (CommandLine LIKE '%lsass%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%procdump%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%tasklist%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%findstr%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wget.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\curl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%E:jscript%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%e:vbscript%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%localgroup Administrators%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/add%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%net%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%user%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/add%' ESCAPE '\') OR ((CommandLine LIKE '%reg add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DisableAntiSpyware%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%\\Microsoft\\Windows Defender%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%reg add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DisableRestrictedAdmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wmic%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%process call create%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wmic%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%shadowcopy%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%vssadmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%shadows%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%wbadmin%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%delete%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%catalog%' ESCAPE '\')))

ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\java%' ESCAPE '\') AND (((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell\_ise.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% echo %' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%procdump%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%tasklist%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%findstr%' ESCAPE '\')) OR (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wget.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\curl.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%http%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%E:jscript%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE title: Mint Sandstorm - Log4J Wstomcat Process Execution
description: Detects Log4J Wstomcat process execution as seen in Mint Sandstorm activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), MSTIC (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\ws\_tomcatservice.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\repadmin.exe' ESCAPE '\')))

title: PaperCut MF/NG Exploitation Related Indicators
description: Detects exploitation indicators related to PaperCut MF/NG Exploitation
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '% /c %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%powershell%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-nop -w hidden%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%Invoke-WebRequest%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%setup.msi%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-OutFile%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%msiexec %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/i %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%setup.msi %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%/qn %' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%IntegratorLogin=fimaribahundq%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: PaperCut MF/NG Potential Exploitation
description: Detects suspicious child processes of "pc-app.exe". Which could indicate potential exploitation of PaperCut
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Huntress DE&TH Team (idea)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\pc-app.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\bash.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\calc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\certutil.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\csc.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\dllhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\scriptrunner.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wmic.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wsl.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Operation Triangulation C2 Beaconing Activity - DNS
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains used in 0day attacks on iOS devices and revealed by Kaspersky and the FSB
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE query IN ('addatamarket.net', 'ans7tv.net', 'anstv.net', 'backuprabbit.com', 'businessvideonews.com', 'cloudsponcer.com', 'datamarketplace.net', 'growthtransport.com', 'mobilegamerstats.com', 'snoweeanalytics.com', 'tagclick-cdn.com', 'topographyupdates.com', 'unlimitedteacup.com', 'virtuallaughing.com', 'web-trackers.com')

title: Potential Operation Triangulation C2 Beaconing Activity - Proxy
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains used in 0day attacks on iOS devices and revealed by Kaspersky and the FSB
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (cs-host LIKE '%addatamarket.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%ans7tv.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%anstv.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%backuprabbit.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%businessvideonews.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%cloudsponcer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%datamarketplace.net%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%growthtransport.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%mobilegamerstats.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%snoweeanalytics.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%tagclick-cdn.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%topographyupdates.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%unlimitedteacup.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%virtuallaughing.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR cs-host LIKE '%web-trackers.com%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential POWERTRASH Script Execution
description: Detects potential execution of the PowerShell script POWERTRASH
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%IO.Compression.DeflateStream%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%IO.MemoryStream%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%::FromBase64String%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%GetDelegateForFunctionPointer%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%.Invoke()%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%GlobalAssemblyCache%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential APT FIN7 Reconnaissance/POWERTRASH Related Activity
description: Detects specific command line execution used by FIN7 as reported by WithSecureLabs for reconnaissance and POWERTRASH execution
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ((CommandLine LIKE '%-noni -nop -exe bypass -f \\\\\*' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%ADMIN$%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%-ex bypass -noprof -nolog -nonint -f%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\')))

title: Potential APT FIN7 POWERHOLD Execution
description: Detects execution of the POWERHOLD script seen used by FIN7 as reported by WithSecureLabs
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4104' AND Channel IN ('Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational', 'PowerShellCore/Operational') AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%$env:APPDATA%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%function MainPayload%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%::WriteAllBytes%' ESCAPE '\' AND ScriptBlockText LIKE '%wscript.exe%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential APT FIN7 Related PowerShell Script Created
description: Detects PowerShell script file creation with specific name or suffix which was seen being used often by FIN7 PowerShell scripts
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%\_64refl.ps1' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE 'host\_ip.ps1' ESCAPE '\')

title: UNC4841 - SSL Certificate Exfiltration Via Openssl
description: Detects the execution of "openssl" to connect to an IP address. This techniques was used by UNC4841 to exfiltrate SSL certificates and as a C2 channel with named pipes. Investigate commands executed in the temporal vicinity of this command.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%/openssl' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP '[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' AND CommandLine LIKE '%s\_client%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-quiet%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%-connect%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%:443%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:8080%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC4841 - Potential SEASPY Execution
description: Detects execution of specific named binaries which were used by UNC4841 to deploy their SEASPY backdoor
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%/BarracudaMailService' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%/resize2fstab' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%/resize\_reisertab' ESCAPE '\')

title: UNC4841 - Email Exfiltration File Pattern
description: Detects filename pattern of email related data used by UNC4841 for staging and exfiltration
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE TargetFilename REGEXP '/mail/tmp/[a-zA-Z0-9]{3}[0-9]{3}\.tar\.gz'

title: UNC4841 - Download Compressed Files From Temp.sh Using Wget
description: Detects execution of "wget" to download a ".zip" or ".rar" files from "temp.sh". As seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%https://temp.sh/%' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%.rar' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.zip' ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC4841 - Barracuda ESG Exploitation Indicators
description: Detects file indicators as seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%/11111.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/aacore.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/appcheck.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/autoins' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/BarracudaMailService' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.daily/core\_check.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.daily/core.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/aacore.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/appcheck.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/etc/cron.hourly/core.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/get\_fs\_info.pl' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/imgdata.jpg' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_att\_v2.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_bvp74\_auth.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_helo.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/install\_reuse.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intent\_helo' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intent\_reuse' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/intentbas' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mknod' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_attachment.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_content.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_require\_helo.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_rtf' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_sender.lua' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/mod\_udp.so' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/nfsd\_stub.ko' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize\_reisertab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize\_risertab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/resize2fstab' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/rverify' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/saslautchd' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/sendscd' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/snapshot.tar' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/p' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/p7' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/tmp/t' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v2.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v31.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_v35.sh' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%/update\_version' ESCAPE '\')

title: UNC4841 - Download Tar File From Untrusted Direct IP Via Wget
description: Detects execution of "wget" to download a "tar" from an IP address that doesn't have a trusted certificate. As seen used by UNC4841 during their Barracuda ESG zero day exploitation.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%/wget' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine REGEXP 'https://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' AND CommandLine LIKE '%--no-check-certificate%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%.tar' ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (((CommandLine LIKE '%https://10.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://192.168.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.16.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.17.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.18.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.19.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.20.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.21.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.22.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.23.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.24.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.25.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.26.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.27.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.28.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.29.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.30.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://172.31.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://127.%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%https://169.254.%' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp ICO C2 File Download
description: Detects potential malicious .ICO files download from a compromised 3CXDesktopApp via web requests to the the malicious Github repository
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (c-uri LIKE '%IconStorages/images/main/icon%' ESCAPE '\' AND c-uri LIKE '%.ico%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Compromised 3CXDesktopApp Beaconing Activity - Netcon
description: Detects potential beaconing activity to domains related to 3CX 3CXDesktopApp compromise

rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\3CXDesktopApp.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (DestinationHostname LIKE '%akamaicontainer.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%akamaitechcloudservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azuredeploystore.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azureonlinecloud.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%azureonlinestorage.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%dunamistrd.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%glcloudservice.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%journalide.org%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msedgepackageinfo.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msstorageazure.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%msstorageboxes.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%officeaddons.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%officestoragebox.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxcloudeservices.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxphonenetwork.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%pbxsources.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%qwepoi123098.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%sbmsa.wiki%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%sourceslabs.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%visualstudiofactory.com%' ESCAPE '\' OR DestinationHostname LIKE '%zacharryblogs.com%' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Potential Suspicious Child Process Of 3CXDesktopApp
description: Detects potential suspicious child processes of "3CXDesktopApp.exe". Which could be related to the 3CXDesktopApp supply chain compromise
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\3CXDesktopApp.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Diamond Sleet APT Scheduled Task Creation - Registry
description: Detects registry event related to the creation of a scheduled task used by Diamond Sleet APT during exploitation of Team City CVE-2023-42793 vulnerability
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4657' AND OperationType IN ('New registry value created', 'Existing registry value modified') AND Channel = 'Security' AND TargetObject LIKE '%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree\\%' ESCAPE '\' AND TargetObject LIKE '%Windows TeamCity Settings User Interface%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Diamond Sleet APT DNS Communication Indicators
description: Detects DNS queries related to Diamond Sleet APT activity

falsepositives: Might generate some false positive if triggered by a user during investigation for example.

title: Diamond Sleet APT Scheduled Task Creation
description: Detects registry event related to the creation of a scheduled task used by Diamond Sleet APT during exploitation of Team City CVE-2023-42793 vulnerability
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Channel = 'Security' AND EventID = '4698' AND TaskName LIKE '\\Windows TeamCity Settings User Interface' ESCAPE '\' AND TaskContent LIKE '%uTYNkfKxHiZrx3KJ%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Diamond Sleet APT DLL Sideloading Indicators
description: Detects DLL sideloading activity seen used by Diamond Sleet APT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\clip.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Version.dll' ESCAPE '\') OR (NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\DSROLE.dll' ESCAPE '\'))

title: Diamond Sleet APT Process Activity Indicators
description: Detects process creation activity indicators related to Diamond Sleet APT
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND CommandLine LIKE '% uTYNkfKxHiZrx3KJ%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Diamond Sleet APT File Creation Indicators
description: Detects file creation activity that is related to Diamond Sleet APT activity
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\4800-84DC-063A6A41C5C' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\clip.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\DSROLE.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Forest64.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\readme.md' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\Version.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\wsmprovhost.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: Rhadamanthys Stealer Module Launch Via Rundll32.EXE
description: Detects the use of Rundll32 to launch an NSIS module that serves as the main stealer capability of Rhadamanthys infostealer, as observed in reports and samples in early 2023
author: TropChaud
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND (OriginalFileName = 'RUNDLL32.EXE' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine LIKE '%nsis\_uns%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%PrintUIEntry%' ESCAPE '\')

title: DarkGate - Autoit3.EXE Execution Parameters
description:
Detects execution of the legitimate Autoit3 utility from a suspicious parent process. AutoIt3.exe is used within
the DarkGate infection chain to execute shellcode that performs process injection and connects to the DarkGate
command-and-control server.
author: Micah Babinski
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\Autoit3.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName = 'AutoIt3.exe') AND (ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\KeyScramblerLogon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\msiexec.exe' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (((NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files (x86)\\AutoIt3\\AutoIt3.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%:\\Program Files\\AutoIt3\\AutoIt3.exe' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: DarkGate - Autoit3.EXE File Creation By Uncommon Process
description:
Detects the usage of curl.exe, KeyScramblerLogon, or other non-standard/suspicious processes used to create Autoit3.exe.
This activity has been associated with DarkGate malware, which uses Autoit3.exe to execute shellcode that performs
process injection and connects to the DarkGate command-and-control server. Curl, KeyScramblerLogon, and these other
processes consitute non-standard and suspicious ways to retrieve the Autoit3 executable.
author: Micah Babinski
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((NewProcessName LIKE '%\\Autoit3.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\curl.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\ExtExport.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\KeyScramblerLogon.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\wmprph.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND TargetFilename LIKE '%\\Autoit3.exe' ESCAPE '\')

title: DarkGate - User Created Via Net.EXE
description: Detects creation of local users via the net.exe command with the name of "DarkGate"
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security' AND (NewProcessName LIKE '%\\net.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR NewProcessName LIKE '%\\net1.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine LIKE '%user%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%add%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%DarkGate%' ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE '%SafeMode%' ESCAPE '\')

title: Potential Pikabot Discovery Activity
description:
Detects system discovery activity carried out by Pikabot, such as incl. network, user info and domain groups.
The malware Pikabot has been seen to use this technique as part of its C2-botnet registration with a short collection time frame (less than 1 minute).
author: Andreas Braathen (mnemonic.io)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND (GrandParentImage LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR (ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\SearchFilterHost.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\SearchProtocolHost.exe' ESCAPE '\')) AND CommandLine IN ('ipconfig.exe /all', 'netstat.exe -aon', 'whoami.exe /all'))

title: Pikabot Fake DLL Extension Execution Via Rundll32.EXE
description: Detects specific process tree behavior linked to "rundll32" executions, wherein the associated DLL lacks a common ".dll" extension, often signaling potential Pikabot activity.
author: Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = '4688' AND Channel = 'Security') AND ((ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\cmd.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\cscript.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\mshta.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\powershell.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\pwsh.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\regsvr32.exe' ESCAPE '\' OR ParentProcessName LIKE '%\\wscript.exe' ESCAPE '\') AND NewProcessName LIKE '%\\rundll32.exe' ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE '%:\\ProgramData\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:\\Users\\Public\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%:\\Windows\\Installer\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%\\AppData\\Roaming\\%' ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (((CommandLine LIKE '%.cpl %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.cpl,%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dll %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dll,%' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.inf %' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.inf,%' ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE '%.cpl' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.cpl"' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dll' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dll"' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.inf' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.inf"' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.cpl''' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.dll''' ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE '%.inf''' ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Potential Pikabot Infection - Suspicious Command Combinations Via Cmd.EXE
description:
Detects the execution of concatenated commands via "cmd.exe". Pikabot often executes a combination of multiple commands via the command handler "cmd /c" in order to download and execute additional payloads.
Commands such as "curl", "wget" in order to download extra payloads. "ping" and "timeout" are abused to introduce delays in the command execution and "Rundll32" is also used to execute malicious DLL files.
In the observed Pikabot infections, a combination of the commands described above are used to orchestrate the download and execution of malicious DLL files.
